## TrailingNodeExtensionOptions.disableTags property

By default this extension will set trailing nodes for all nodes except for the ones that have the tag `Tags.LastNodeCompatible`<!-- -->. Setting this to true means that the only nodes that will be ignored are those passed to the `ignoredNodes` array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
disableTags?: boolean;
```
